plot: An inspirational film about a young farmer who, after the loss of his little girl, overcomes his inability to communicate and express himself to those he loves.
title: Tin Man
plot_es: An inspirational film about a young farmer who, after the loss of his little girl, overcomes his inability to communicate and express himself to those he loves.
plot_en: An inspirational film about a young farmer who, after the loss of his little girl, overcomes his inability to communicate and express himself to those he loves.
